::: {.password-container}

<div id="passwordPrompt">
  <p align="center">
    <img src="wedding_title3.png" width="525px">
  </p>
  <h4>Please enter the password for Alivia & Byeong-Hak's Wedding Photo Gallery:</h4>
  <h4>알리비아와 병학의 웨딩 사진 갤러리 비밀번호를 입력해주세요:</h4>
  <div style="text-align: center;">
  <form onsubmit="checkPassword(event)" style="display: inline-block;">
    <input type="password" id="password" style="padding: 8px; font-size: 1rem;">
    <button type="submit" style="padding: 8px 16px; font-size: 1rem;">Submit (클릭)</button>
  </form>
  </div>
</div>


<div id="protectedContent" style="display:none;">
  <p align="center">
    <img src="wedding_title3.png" width="600px" tabindex="-1">
  </p>
  
### Welcome to the Alivia & Byeong-Hak's Wedding Photo Gallery!

  <p><a href="https://bcdanl.github.io/acbcweddingphoto" tabindex="-1" id="galleryLink">Click here! (여기를  클릭하세요!)</a></p>
</div>

:::

<script>
function checkPassword(event) {
    event.preventDefault(); // Prevent form reload
    const correctPassword = "acbc25";
    const inputPassword = document.getElementById("password").value;

    if (inputPassword === correctPassword) {
        document.getElementById("protectedContent").style.display = "block";
        document.getElementById("passwordPrompt").style.display = "none";
        // Enable tab focus for protected content now
        document.getElementById("galleryLink").removeAttribute("tabindex");
    } else {
        alert("Incorrect password. Please try again.");
    }
}
</script>
